Combat
Hit Points: 20 Armor Class: 19 (dexterity (0 max); trained) Class DC: Fighter: 14 (strength; trained)
Armor: Full Plate Shield: Buckler (+1 AC when raised; hardness 3; HP 6) Weapons: Fangs (+8 1d6+1 P; dexterity; expert); Light Pick (+6 1d4+1 P [Crit d8]; strength; expert); Sap (+6 1d6+1 B; strength; expert); Scimitar (+6 1d6+1 S; strength; expert)
Combat Notes:
Constitution Hit Points Adjustment: +2
Dexterity Attack Adjustment: +2
Fangs: Fangs inflict 1d6 HP piercing
Strength Attack Adjustment: +1
Bloodletting Fangs: Fangs inflict +1d4 HP persistent bleed on a critical hit
Reactive Strike: (R) Makes a melee Strike on a foe within reach that uses a manipulate or move action, makes a ranged Strike, or leaves a square while moving
Shield Block: (R) Raised shield negates damage equal to its hardness; self and shield each suffer any remaining damage
Snagging Strike: (1) Successful melee Strike with the other hand free inflicts off-guard until the start of the next turn
Undead Slayer: Inflicts additional damage vs. undead equal to the number of weapon damage dice, or double the number of dice vs. vampires
Save: Fortitude: +7 (constitution; expert); Reflex: +7 (dexterity; expert); Will: +4 (wisdom; trained)
Save Notes:
Necromantic Physiology: +2 vs. disease, and successful saves vs. disease are critical successes
Svetocher: Treats drained condition as 1 step lower for Fortitude save and Hit Point reduction
Void Healing: Vitality effects cause harm and void effects heal
Magic
Attack: Divine Innate: +3 (charisma; trained) Spell DC: Divine Innate: 13 (charisma; trained)
Spells:
Animal Form (D2): (2) Self becomes a Medium animal with 5 temporary HP, Armor Class 17, +9 attack, +1 damage, low-light vision, 30' imprecise scent, +9 Athletics modifier, and creature-specific features for 1 min (heightened 3rd gives 10 temporary HP, Armor Class 18, +14 attack, +5 damage, +14 Athletics; 4th becomes a Large creature with 10' reach, 15 temporary HP, Armor Class 19, +16 attack, +9 damage, +16 Athletics; 5th becomes a Huge creature with 15' reach, 20 temporary HP, Armor Class 19, +18 attack, +7 damage with double damage dice, +20 Athletics)
Charm (D1): (2) R30' Target becomes friendly, or helpful if already friendly, and cannot use hostile actions against self for 1 hr (save Will negates; critical success allows the target to notice the attempt; critical failure makes the target helpful) (heightened 4th effects last until next daily prep; heightened 8th effects last until next daily prep and affect 10 targets)
Mist (D2): (3) R120' 20' burst conceals creatures for 1 min
Pest Form (D1): (2) Self becomes a Tiny animal with Armor Class 16, 20' Speed, low-light vision, 30' imprecise scent, +10 Acrobatics and Stealth modifiers, -4 Athletics modifier, and weakness 5 to physical damage for 10 min (heightened 4th becomes a creature with a 20' fly Speed)
Vampiric Exsanguination (D6): (2) 30' cone inflicts 12d6 HP void, giving self temporary HP for 1 min equal to half that suffered by the most-affected target (save basic Fortitude) (heightened +1 inflicts +2d6 HP)
Magic Notes:
Enthralling Allure: Knows the Charm divine innate spell; can cast it at rank 1 once per day
Form Of The Bat: (1) Knows the Pest Form divine innate spell; can cast it (bat form only) at 4th rank once per hr
Night Magic: Knows the Animal Form and Mist divine innate spells; can cast each (Animal Form wolf only) at 2nd rank once per day
Symphony Of Blood: Knows the Vampiric Exsanguination divine innate spell; can cast it at 7th rank once per day
Notes
